title: BBC Local Live: Leicestershire on Friday 3 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: cannabis factory found in thorpe astley .
taxi passenger pleads guilty to 'car dooring ' .
shakespeare to discuss future after hull match .
foxes to take a trip for warm-weather training .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from leicestershire local live this week .
updates will start again on monday at 08:00 .

documents.title: reassurance events to be held following fatal fire
text: following wednesday 's fatal fire in ashby-de-la-zouch , in which a man died at a commercial property on market street , leicestershire fire and rescue service will be holding some community reassurance sessions .
the fire service will be on hand in the town tomorrow and on tuesday to give advice to local business owners and residents .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: east midlands weather update : more rain to come tonight
text: it 'll be cloudy with further outbreaks of rain through this evening and overnight .
the rain could be heavy at times but will become patchier in the early hours .
author: Lucy Martin
BBC Weather

documents.title: travel : delays on a46
text: long queues towards the hobby horse island ( a607 ) on the a46 and those queues stretching back towards the markfield road ( a50 ) turn
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : road closed in barrow
text: another burst water main
flint lane is about to be closed in barrow upon soar due to a burst water main
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: burst water pipe causing problems in loughborough
text: the water supplier has said some people in loughborough might not have any water this afternoon and evening due to a burst pipe on chaveney road .
customers in # loughborough # le12 # le11 please see this link if you have no water :
i have 2 children with sickness and diarrhoea and no hand washing or toilet facilities now - any advice please ?
i 'm sorry to hear this , we were only made aware of the leak a short while a go .
we 'll work hard to restore supply asap .
of course but that does n't help me keep my children clean or keep the third from catching it .
i 've known for 2 hours .
i appreciate it 's not ideal .
we 've a lot of customers affected by this and will work hard to restore the water asap .
holly
i understand but watching your child get ill is not `` not ideal ''
i am sorry paula & do understand how frustrating this must be but we will do all we can to resolve this asap .
laura
the 9pm target seems to have disappeared - are we now in for the long haul ?
honesty as this point would be appreciated
we will do everything we can to get supplies restored by this time but can not always guarantee that this will go to plan .
that link tells us nothing ! !
hi daniel - we we 're made aware of the leak a short while ago & will try to restore the water as soon as possible .
holly
how long before the water is back on ? ? ?
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : shakespeare focusing on hull match
text: craig shakespeare has told the media his focus is only on tomorrow 's match against hull
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: travel : delays continue on m69
text: having thought the m69 was better it 's not .
recovery is needed before the m1 and it 's not going to be an easy job .
expect delays
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: missing man found
text: missing leicester man , tofikahmed kureshi has been located , thank you all for sharing .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police appeal after man was knocked unconscious in leicester
text: police are asking for help to identify this man captured on cctv
it 's after an 18-year-old man was assaulted in leicester last month .
he was knocked unconscious outside a premises on east gates in leicester and needed hospital treatment for an injury to his face .
it happened on saturday 4 february .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police find 150 cannabis plants in thorpe astley house
text: police have discovered this cannabis factory at a house in thorpe astley
officers went into the property on priestman road on wednesday and discovered more than 150 cannabis plants in the top floor of the address .
no-one was arrested and police are investigating .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: five arrested after attempt to steal aldi cash machine
text: you might remember back in december last year there was an attempt to steal the cash machine at aldi on meridian way .
well police have said they 've just arrested five people in the west leicester area in connection with the offence .
four men aged between 19 and 42 have been arrested on sus of conspiracy to commit robbery .
a 39-year-old woman has also been arrested on sus of possession of criminal property .
all are in police custody .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: family 'worried ' about missing man
text: have you seen this man ?
leicestershire police have told us he 's been reported missing and his family are feeling `` increasingly worried '' .
tofikahmed kureshi is 40 years old and was last seen on diseworth street in leicester just before midnight last night .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: foxes to get some 'bonding time ' on a trip away
text: it looks like the foxes will be heading away for some spring sunshine soon .
craig shakespeare said the club is taking the players away for a few days after the hull game - a trip that has apparently been in the pipeline for a few months .
they 'll do a bit of warm-weather training and use it as an opportunity to get together as a team .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: ulloa fit and 'raring to go '
text: going back to the game against hull this weekend , craig shakespeare said he thinks the game is `` bigger '' that the match against liverpool .
he said : `` we have to put in another performance .
the players realise that .
`` the first start is getting back-to-back wins and i 'm confident with the squad we have we can pull away ( from the relegation zone ) . ''
when asked about leonardo ulloa ( who had said he would n't play for the club again ) , shakespeare said : it was just a case of him getting fit .
he 's raring to go . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: foxes interim boss 'comfortable ' with recruitment process
text: craig shakespeare has started his press conference by confirming `` everyone 's fit '' for their game against hull this weekend .
he then moved on to the topic everyone is talking about - who will be claudio ranieri 's long-term successor .
the clubs interim boss said : i 'll leave that to the powers that be .
i 've been told to prepare for this game .
i 've been kept informed and i 'm quite comfortable with that . ''
when asked about the roy hodgson rumours he said it was `` just speculation '' .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: watch : woman injured in axe robbery
text: yesterday we told you about how a woman suffered a head injury when a shop was robbed by a man carrying an axe .
well here 's some shocking footage that shows the robbery taking place
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: elderly woman punched in face during attempted burglary
text: a man forced himself into a house in leicester and demanded money from a 77-year-old woman .
he then punched the woman in the face - she needed hospital treatment for her injuries .
the man did n't get any cash and did n't taken anything from the house on richmond road on wednesday .
det cons matthew wiggins said : this was a nasty attack on an elderly woman in the middle of the day at a busy period and there would have been numerous people around .
if you may have seen the suspect either before or after the offence , or have any information that may assist , please contact me . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: foxes press conference underway
text: coffee was interrupted by the caretaker manager 's arrival
author: Ian Stringer
BBC Radio Leicester Foxes commentator

documents.title: travel : m69 stopped for debris clear up
text: # m69 s/b btwn j1 and the # m6 now has traffic temporarilly stopped for our # trafficofficers to clear debris after collision should n't be long
the standing water on this section is horrendous !
put up some signs whilst you are there for motorists to put their damned lights on please
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fans of auf wiedersehen , pet campaign to save redmile pub
text: fans of auf wiedersehen , pet are trying to save this leicestershire pub that featured in series two of the much-loved tv show
the windmill inn in redmile ( known as the barley mow to fans of the show ) is going to public auction later in the year so the fate of the property is unknown .
the show 's official fan site claims thousands of fans visit the pub every year .
they 've set up a consortium to try to save it .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fatal crash : passenger pleads guilty to 'car dooring '
text: you might remember hearing about sam boulton , the 26-year-old cyclist who .
died after being hit by a van outside leicester railway station in july last year .
the van had swerved to avoid the door of a taxi that had been opened into the road .
today , 56-year-old mandy chapel from speers road in leicester pleaded guilty to `` opening a vehicle so as to injure or endanger a person '' ( also known as car dooring ) .
she was fined £ 80 .
the taxi driver , 56-year-old farook bhikhu from wicklow drive in leicester , pleaded not guilty to `` permitting the opening a vehicle so as to injure or endanger a person '' .
his trial will take place at loughborough magistrates ' court on 5 june .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: twycross zoo teaching elephants to walk into transport crates
text: earlier on in the week we told you about twycross zoo moving their asian elephants elsewhere .
twycross will now begin a year-long training programme to teach the herd to walk into a transport crate .
it 's hoped they will breed and ensure the survival of the species .
today i caught up with the zoo 's director of life sciences , dr charlotte macdonald .
she said : `` they are very attractive animals - because we have two females of reproductive age , plus a young female calf who will then become a breeder in the future .
`` i think actually a few zoos will want to take them '' .
author: Heidi Booth
Journalist, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: protest about homelessness in leicester returns
text: the homelessness protesters are back out in leicester - but not at jubilee square this time .
they 've pitched up outside town hall square
we are aware of the protesters ' tent in town hall square and are considering the options available to us . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storytelling festival begins at bbc leicester
text: radio leicester 's free festival celebrating leicester success stories starts today .
events include `` stories of leicester '' food fair , which is under way at bbc leicester now
you can sample local delicacies that tell leicester 's gourmet story .
there 's a full list of storytelling events here .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: male grooming industry 'flourishing in leicester '
text: another male grooming salon has just opened in leicester - the owner of l'homme has told the bbc it 's an industry that 's becoming increasingly popular in the midlands .
andreas ioannou said the negative stigma of men `` taking care of themselves '' has gone .
he said it 's not just hairdressing that 's popular - the salon even does the old-fashioned hot-towel shaves .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: is michael o'neill interested in leicester city job ?
text: northern ireland manager michael o'neill is the latest boss to be sounded out about the vacant leicester job .
author: The Daily Mail

documents.title: full electrification of the midland mainline thrown into doubt
text: plans for the full electrification of the midland mainline have once again been thrown into doubt after a critical report on overspending on a similar project .
it 's the only north-south line in the country not to be electrified .
earlier this week the department for transport announced which three companies were in the bidding for the east midlands rail franchise , which will start in 2019 .
by then the line from corby to london will be electrified - but what about the rest of the line ?
today 's report demands major projects must get independent assurances that future electrification plans are actually worthwhile for passengers .
author: Tony Roe
BBC East Midlands political editor

documents.title: rugby : veainu felt 'hopeless ' during three month absence
text: leicester tigers full-back telusa veainu has said he felt lost on the sidelines during his three months out .
the tonga international had a break after suffering several concussions .
he said : `` it was really hard being cleared to play but not fully clear because of the concussion protocol - i felt so hopeless .
he starts for tigers tonight against exeter .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: latest leicestershire headlines
text: latest leicestershire headlines
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: council to approve timetable for melton bypass
text: proposals to build an £ 80m bypass for melton mowbray are `` progressing '' according to leicestershire county council .
its ruling cabinet is set to approve a timetable to work up plans for the route , as councillors believe traffic jams are holding back the town 's growth .
it said studies suggest an eastern distributor road could be the most cost effective way of easing congestion .
the public will be consulted on a preferred route .
author: East Midlands Today

documents.title: have retailers been 'put off ' using clothing manufacturers in leicester ?
text: recent figures have shown workers at most of leicester 's clothes factories are being paid half the minimum wage .
well , the general manager of a leicester-based garment manufacturer has told the bbc this is discouraging high street retailers from having clothes make in the city .
mick cheema from basic premier said there 's a concern among shops that selling clothing made in leicester could give them bad publicity .
leicester city council has said it 's `` very concerned '' but claims this is n't just an issue facing leicester .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: east midlands weather forecast
text: east midlands weather forecast
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: foxes interim boss to talk to media
text: craig shakespeare is due to hold his pre-hull city press conference today .
we 'll have all the key quotes and headlines from 13:00 on local live .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: the mentality behind leicester city 's season
text: last night on the premier league show matthew syed analysed the mentality behind the extraordinary season at leicester city .
it was filmed here in leicester with gabby logan , dion dublin and comedian mark watson .
you can watch the show again .
here .
author: BBC Two

documents.title: join us for today 's live news coverage
text: happy friday leicestershire - i 'll be writing the updates on your local live page today with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
the photo at the top of today 's page was sent by les golding and shows boats on thornton reservoir - one of my favourite places to go running in the county .
if you 'd like to share your photos with us you can send them by email or by facebook or twitter .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live
